xmpp.XMLUtil

type
class
available in
neko, js, flash, php, node
XML utilities.

Static Methods

inline addElement(x : Xml, name : String, content : String) : Xml

parameters
x XML element to attach the created element to
n Name of xml node
t Node content

addField(x : Xml, o : Dynamic, n : String, ?required : Bool) : Xml

parameters
x XML element to attach the element to
o The target object, provider of value
n Name of XML node
t Node content

addFields(x : Xml, o : Dynamic, ?fields : Iterable<String>) : Xml

parameters
x XML element to attach the create element to
o The target object to get the field value from
fields Optional names of fields, reflected if null

createElement(n : String, t : String) : Xml

parameters
n Name of xml element to create
t Node content

inline ns(x : Xml, ?ns : String) : String

Set or get the namespace of the given xml element.

reflectElements<T>(target : T, x : Xml) : T
